unitySet.name: KorvinGrounds
unitySet.metadata: Fast paced TD-style RTS Summoner genre game coming 2024 to Steam featuring CharStack

charStack.name: SpoSki Algorithm
charStack.metadata: Efficient mass-compile algorithm that manages Unity DOTS Entities. Efficiently creates, destroys and compiles data for entities in a single frame.

charStack.name: CharAPI
charStack.metadata: Unity DOTS based API that manages the creation of entities, components and physics data

charStack.name: Kark
charStack.metadata: Inject Obfuscated Code snippets into Unity components that link themselves to prevent the execution of the game outside genuine conditions.

charStack.name: SinEngine
charStack.metadata: Bakes scenarios for in-game renders and manages the position and behaviour of the Camera object in-game.

remnantSet.name: Denk-Sharp
remnantSet.metadata: A simple encryptor that takes user input and encrypts each character with a unique 512/1024/2048/4096 character encryption key.

remnantSet.name: Denk-PlusPlus
remnantSet.metadata: A remake of the C# Denk-Sharp algorithm, but in C++ and with a few more features. Including Buffering and Deserialization.

remnantSet.name: www.imcnorvik.xyz
remnantSet.metadata: This Portfolio website was made to improve my vanilla React knowledge, but overall a fun and painful experience.

remnantSet.name: Kenny-sharp
remnantSet.metadata: Kenny is a C#/Unity C# library to handle repetitive and long tasks while keeping the source code clean and tight.

remnantSet.name: 100 CLI Projects
remnantSet.metadata: 100 Random and fun CLI C# projects chosen from different sources across Twitter and Github or all over Google.
